ue_addons.ponder.scorched.text_1:
The bottom consists of a maximum of 16x16
Rectangular Scorched Bricks composition
ue_addons.ponder.scorched.text_2:
Put the second layer in any direction
Foundry Controller
Fuel Tank
Scorched Drain
ue_addons.ponder.scorched.text_6:
The rest of the surface we fill with bricks
At the same time, put faucet in front of drain.
ue_addons.ponder.scorched.text_7: In addition, we can also use bricks to continue to build high.
ue_addons.ponder.scorched.text_8: Finally, remember to import fuel to Fuel Tank
ue_addons.ponder.smeltery.text_1:
The bottom consists of a maximum of 11x11
Rectangular Seared Bricks composition
ue_addons.ponder.smeltery.text_2:
Put the second layer in any direction
Fuel Tank
Smeltery Controller
Seared Drain
ue_addons.ponder.smeltery.text_6:
The rest of the surface we fill with bricks
At the same time, put faucet in front of drain.
ue_addons.ponder.smeltery.text_7: In addition, we can also use bricks to continue to build high.
ue_addons.ponder.smeltery.text_8: Finally, remember to import fuel to Fuel Tank
ue_addons.ponder.the_accelerator_of_mech: Rightclick it with an iron mechanism in hand...
...and the stone around it changes into ore!
The accelerator also supports other mechanisms
But attention, only blocks in 5x5 zone around it can be transformed!
